eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

functionDecorators.name: alterAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Used to add admins who are allowed to add funds to the investment contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the admin to add or remove.

parameterDecorators.name: _status
parameterDecorators.description: True to add the user, False to remove the user. *.

functionDecorators.name: tokenEscape
functionDecorators.description: This allows Coinvest to take all valuable tokens from the TokenSwap contract. *. Allow the owner to take Ether or tokens off of this contract if they are accidentally sent.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenContract
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to withdraw (0x0 if Ether).

functionDecorators.name: receiveApproval
functionDecorators.description: approveAndCall will be used on the old token to transfer from the user to the contract, which will then return to them the new tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The user that is making the call.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens being transferred to this swap contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token contract (address(oldToken))--not used.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Extra data with the call--not used. *.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The address that has transferred this contract tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens that have been transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: The extra data sent with transfer (should be nothing). *.

functionDecorators.name: transferCoinvest
functionDecorators.description: Changes the Coinvest wallet that will receive funds from investment contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _newCoinvest
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new wallet. *.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
